sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROSIERS-aux-Salines, a town of France, in Lorraine, and in the bailiwick of Nancy, famous ſor its ſalt-works. The works that king Staniſlaus made here are much admired. It is ſeated on the river Muert, in Ε. Long. 6. 27. N. Lat. 48. 32.
